title: 820-01041 nand shorted to ground
message:
hi, this board came in dead at 5v 0amp, a bit of water dmg around u9080
i see that pp3v3_G3h is shorted at u9080, removing u9080, and i got 20v and a bit of fluctuating amp.
i see that pp2v5 is shorted to ground 0 ohm. I inject 1v and found U8800 is heating up.
removing u8800 and short pp2v5 is gone, diode mode is good now.
the question is, does anyone can replace this nand ? im an iphone technician too so im familiar with jc programming if thats helping.
thanks in advance

title: 820-01041 nand shorted to ground
message:
As the chip is burnt, you don't lose anything changing it.
After that, you should try to restore it in DFU mode, if possible.
